CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​IChangeWatcher
public interface
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​IChangeWatcher
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Links.​Manager
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Builders.​HTML
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​Manager

An interface for any class that wants to watch for changes in the code database.

Multithreading: Thread Safety Notes

This interface is used for receiving notifications when the database has changed.  As such, these functions can be called from any possible thread.  Make sure any structures you interact with are thread safe.

Because event handlers will be called while holding a database lock, you should keep interaction with other modules to a minimum to prevent deadlocks.  You don't want to access another thread-safe module causing your thread to wait for it to lock while another thread is holding that lock and waiting to access the database.  The event handler should ideally just collect the topic and class IDs for work that needs to be done and return, letting other code do the actual work later.

Topic topic,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called after a topic is added to the database.

void OnUpdateTopic (
Topic oldTopic,
Topic newTopic,
Topic.ChangeFlags changeFlags,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called after a topic has been updated in the database.

OnDeleteTopic
void OnDeleteTopic (
Topic topic,
IDObjects.NumberSet linksAffected,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called before a topic is deleted from the database.  It will include the IDs of the links that previously resolved to this topic, but you can wait for OnChangeLinkTarget() to handle that.

OnAddLink
void OnAddLink (
Link link,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called after a link is added to the database.

OnChangeLinkTarget
void OnChangeLinkTarget (
Link link,
int oldTargetTopicID,
int oldTargetClassID,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called after a link's target has been changed in the database.  Note that this will also be called for new links, as they are added to the database as unresolved during the parsing stage, and then changed to their targets during the resolving stage.

OnDeleteLink
void OnDeleteLink (
Link link,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called before a link is deleted from the database.

void OnAddImageLink (
ImageLink imageLink,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called after an image link is added to the database.

OnChangeImageLinkTarget
void OnChangeImageLinkTarget (
ImageLink imageLink,
int oldTargetFileID,
EventAccessor eventAccessor
)

Called after an image link's target has been changed in the database.  Note that this will also be called for new image links, as they are added to the database as unresolved during the parsing stage, and then changed to their targets during the resolving stage.

EventAccessor eventAccessor

Called before an image link is deleted from the database.
